property.name: mdpc.descrs
property.value: Playlist generator and podcast player for gmusicbrowser

project.property: This package provides `gmusicradio` -- a script that can be used to control the playback of a running gmusicbrowser instance in a radio-inspired way but for personal listening on a local Linux machine. . The primary playback principle is to prefer new podcast episodes as they come online while the application is running. Outside of that, music is played back with highly rated songs being interleaved with less-highly rated songs. . Once started, gmusicradio runs in parallel to gmusicbrowser and automatically enqueues new songs to play as the playback in gmusicbrowser continues. . See /usr/share/doc/mdvl-gmusicradio/README.md for the complete documentation.
